maml:description.maml:para: Searches for specified SysMon Events and retunrs the Event Data as a custom object.
Searches for specified SysMon Events and retunrs the Event Data as a custom object.

maml:Description.maml:para: Sysmon Event ID of records to show
Specifies the maximum number of events that Get-WinEvent returns. Enter an integer. The default is to return all the events in the logs or files.
Specifies a path to one or more exported SysMon events in evtx format.
Start Date to get all event going forward.

maml:description.maml:para: Create a new filter for the actions against the registry.
Create a new filter for actions against the registry. Supports filtering by aby of the following event types: * CreateKey
* DeleteKey
* RenameKey
* CreateValue
* DeleteValue
* RenameValue
* SetValue
Hives in TargetObject are referenced as: * \REGISTRY\MACHINE\HARDWARE
* \REGISTRY\USER\Security ID number
* \REGISTRY\MACHINE\SECURITY
* \REGISTRY\USER\.DEFAULT
* \REGISTRY\MACHINE\SYSTEM
* \REGISTRY\MACHINE\SOFTWARE
* \REGISTRY\MACHINE\SAM
